subtitle: Pintereso is a free Jekyll theme, Pinterest style.
description: Pintereso is a free Jekyll theme designed with a Pinterest-style layout, offering a visually appealing and user-friendly interface for bloggers and content creators. Its grid-based design is ideal for showcasing images and multimedia content, making it perfect for portfolios, photography websites, and creative blogs. Pintereso's clean and responsive design ensures an optimal viewing experience across all devices, while its customizable features allow users to tailor the theme to their specific needs and preferences. With its seamless integration with Jekyll, Pintereso provides a powerful and flexible solution for those looking to create a visually engaging online presence.

subtitle: Minimal starter template for websites using Bootstrap 5 and Webpixels CSS next to the Eleventy static site generator.
description: The minimal starter template is an efficient and versatile solution for building websites, utilizing the powerful combination of Bootstrap 5 and Webpixels CSS alongside the Eleventy static site generator. This template offers a streamlined foundation, enabling developers to quickly and easily create responsive, aesthetically pleasing websites with modern design elements. Bootstrap 5 provides a robust framework for developing mobile-first, responsive sites, while Webpixels CSS enhances the design with its utility-first approach. Eleventy, a simple yet flexible static site generator, ensures fast performance and easy deployment. Together, these tools offer a comprehensive, minimalistic starting point for web development projects, catering to both simplicity and functionality.
features: Includes Eleventy static site generator for building the layouts and pages
Includes Bootstrap (currently using v5) source files via npm
Includes Webpixels CSS as our design system based on Bootstrap 5
TIncludes npm scripts for compiling and autoprefixing Sass, compiling JS, watching for changes, and starting a basic local server
Example JavaScript file (js/main.js) showing how to import all Bootstrap

subtitle: The perfect starting point for your next web app built with Bootstrap 5.
description: The ideal foundation for your upcoming web application, our starter kit built with Bootstrap 5, offers a seamless blend of simplicity and efficiency. This free and minimalistic toolkit is designed to expedite the development of fast and contemporary dashboards and applications. With a focus on modern aesthetics and robust functionality, it provides developers with a reliable and flexible starting point, ensuring a smooth and accelerated path to project completion.
features: Includes Eleventy static site generator for building the layouts and pages
Includes Bootstrap (currently using v5) source files via npm
Includes Webpixels CSS as our design system based on Bootstrap 5
TIncludes npm scripts for compiling and autoprefixing Sass, compiling JS, watching for changes, and starting a basic local server
Example JavaScript file (js/main.js) showing how to import all Bootstrap

subtitle: Bootstrap 4 theme, sb-admin, Jekyll version
description: Introducing the Jekyll version of the renowned Bootstrap 4 theme, SB Admin. This adaptation brings the sleek and professional design of SB Admin to the versatile Jekyll static site generator, offering developers an efficient solution for creating dynamic and visually appealing administrative dashboards. The theme combines the responsive and modern features of Bootstrap 4 with the simplicity and flexibility of Jekyll, ensuring a streamlined development process and a polished final product.

subtitle: A Jekyll implementation of the Stylish Portfolio template by Start Bootstrap
description: The Jekyll implementation of the Stylish Portfolio template by Start Bootstrap offers a seamless integration of a modern, one-page portfolio design into the versatile Jekyll static site generator. This adaptation allows developers to leverage Jekyll's powerful features, such as easy content management and site generation, while benefiting from the elegant and responsive design of the Stylish Portfolio template. The template is ideal for showcasing projects, portfolios, and personal websites, providing a sleek, user-friendly interface that enhances the visitor experience.

subtitle: The Jekyll Bootstrap theme combines the robust
description: The Jekyll Bootstrap theme combines the robust, static site generation capabilities of Jekyll with the elegant, responsive design framework of Bootstrap. This theme enables developers to build visually appealing, highly functional websites quickly and efficiently. By leveraging Bootstrap's extensive library of pre-designed components and styles, users can ensure their sites are mobile-friendly and adhere to modern design standards. Meanwhile, Jekyll's simplicity in content management and site deployment streamlines the development process, making it an excellent choice for personal blogs, portfolios, and business websites.

subtitle: My webdev profesional website, refactored on Gatsby
description: I've been crafting a refined web development portfolio to showcase my skills and experience. This revamped site, built with Gatsby, offers a seamless and engaging user experience, highlighting my capabilities in crafting modern web applications.

subtitle: Hugo portfolio page theme with Bootstrap 5
description: I particularly wanted to use the latest iteration of Bootstrap, which at the time of this writing is 5. They chucked JQuery with this release, and with the exception of a small amount for some use cases, no Javascript is required anymore. Even with these improvements, Bootstrap is waaay overkill for what I am doing. However, it's also a quick to market way to get clean CSS. Bulma is another that I enjoy using for this same reason.
